folder_description: My love, I'm so happy we get to serve God together. Ang mga after church dates nga ni are one of thest best times nga maka bonding kita. In fellowship and in love.
My love, I'm so happy we get to serve God together. Ang mga after church dates nga ni are one of thest best times nga maka bonding kita. In fellowship and in love.
My love, I'm so happy we get to serve God together. Ang mga after church dates nga ni are one of thest best times nga maka bonding kita. In fellowship and in love.
My love, I'm so happy we get to serve God together. Ang mga after church dates nga ni are one of thest best times nga maka bonding kita. In fellowship and in love.

Our first date.
Probably the cutest date we had. That time may gin process kita sa cultural and that was a spontaneous nga hagad. We went to Madge Cafe pagkatapos gin dala taka sa babaw sng Gaisano kay wala ka kabalo may ara pana to sang mga churches and activities. HAHA what a cute moment

Sa amuni nga time we stopped by somewhere dira sa esplanade nga may mga plungkuan. Tapos after na, gapang explore kaya. Nagsaka kada kay gusto mo i-check AHAHAHA. Pagkita mo puno ka tubig nga higko ğŸ˜­
We were walking sa esplanade and naabutan ta dawn. Hambal ko "Picturi ko bala tas i-story." HAHAHA hambal mo sakon dason "Indi nana karon lowkey, soft launch nana "
Story time. Naglagaw ta sa festive then naglakat ta pa Sunset Boulevard. Nagstay ta to for a while tas gulpi lang nagbundak ang ulan. AAHAHHA mga basang sisiw
You loved this pic of us a lotğŸ¥¹. Cutie
AHAHAHAHA nagbundak na ulan tas isa lang payong ta. Ang gamay-gamay ko pana nga payong ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­
AHAHAHAHA nagbundak na ulan tas isa lang payong ta. Ang gamay-gamay ko pana nga payong ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­

Another majestic date. Amuni ang story nga first time ko maghatag sa imo sng flower. We were walking along Esplanade and you were looking at flowers. Then, gin kaptan ko ang isa ka flower and it fell down. Gin kwa ko siya and I gave it to you. You said, "First muni nga flower gn hatag sakon". I said, "Really?" then followed up with this beautiful quote "Love, bal-an mo ngaa wilted flower? Because sang gin pa meet kita, we were not at our best. We got to know each other at out lowest point."And I think that's beautiful ğŸ¥¹ğŸ¥¹
Wala ko balo kung din ta ni halin basta ara ta sa Espla ah HAHAHAAH
We saw two cattos ga dogsinganay as we were walkingğŸ±ğŸ±
